data.title: A Nest to A Default Cosmic Divide
data.description: This is a good cosmic divide to cut off the front of A Site from the back of A Site allowing your teammate to plant the bomb.

data.title: B Site Cosmic Divide
data.description: This is a good cosmic divide to separate the front of B Site and the back of B Site.

data.title: A Nest to A Site Corner Nova Pulse
data.description: This is a good nova pulse to concuss enemies playing in A Ramp Corner allowing you to swing and get a frag.

data.title: B Green to B Site Nebula
data.description: This is a good nebula combo to block off all angles on B Site allowing your teammate to plant the bomb without being seen.

data.title: A Nest to A Pipes Nebula
data.description: This is a good nebula to block a common angle that people like to op. Placing your smoke ontop of A Pipes allow you to block the angle and push up with your team and execute the site.

data.title: B Green Dissipate Nebula
data.description: This is a good nebula to dissipate to sneak up B Green and allow you to successfully get a flank off.

data.title: B Green Gravity Well
data.description: This is a good gravity well lineup to clear both of the corners at the box of B Green.

data.title: Mid Blue to Mid Boiler Nebula
data.description: This is a good nebula to block off mid boiler and allow your team to take control of middle.

data.title: A Site Nova Pulse
data.description: This a good nova pulse to concuss an enemy playing on A Site allowing you to get a pick and take A Site.

data.title: A Nest to A Generator Gravity Well
data.description: This is a good gravity well to pull enemies out of the generator corner of A Site and allow you to get a quick and easy kill.
